product_name: Saris Porter 4-Bike Hitch Rack with Cable Lock and Key
long_description: With the extra security of a cable lock and key, the Saris Bike Porter 4-Bike Locking Hitch Rack loads up 4 bikes of varying sizes to get your family or group of friends out on the road. Frame is constructed of durable steel and fits both 2 and 1.25 in. hitch sizes. Arms feature ratcheting, anti-sway straps to secure and stabilize bikes and prevent bike-to-bike contact. Grooved rubber cradles separate your shift and brake cables from your frame. Frame folds down for easy access to trunk. The Saris Bike Porter Hitch 4-bike rack carries 4 bikes up to 35 lbs. each. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; bikes with step-through frames require the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: With the extra security of a cable lock and key, the Saris Bike Porter 4-Bike Locking Hitch Rack loads up 4 bikes of varying sizes to get your family or group of friends out on the road.
